title: Sri Lanka Beachfront Elegance in Balapitiya with Outdoor Pool, Restaurant & Spa
description: Coastal charm awaits on the pristine shores of Balapitiya, Sri Lanka at Kumu Beach. This beachfront haven offers an exclusive escape, with its sun-drenched infinity pool and personalised service. Savour the flavours of Sri Lanka at the hotel's restaurant, where local ingredients meet innovative culinary techniques, and allow yourself to be pampered in spa treatment rooms that face the glorious Indian Ocean.
offer_address: 670/5, Galle Road, Welagedara, Balapitiya 80550, Sri Lanka
